nodes.text: The Rihkxyrk (rik-zerk) Assault Fighter was a heavy assault fighter built by TransGalMeg Industries, Incorporated.

The Rihkxyrk was a relatively sluggish fighter, but this was compensated for by its good defenses and weapons loadout. It was one of the most heavily armed and armored starfighters of the Rebellion era.

The ship was used by the Black Sun organization as well as other criminal groups during the Galactic Civil War.
The ship's tight defenses led to many Rihkxyrk pilots having a high sense of confidence in their own abilities as well as that of their ships, after surviving undamaged in many heavy conflicts.
